tweet.text: Albright majored in political science at @Wellesley, writing her honors thesis on Czechoslovakian prime minister Zdeněk Fierlinger. She later studied International Relations and Russian at @SAISHopkins. https://t.co/1EEW3iD4zQ https://t.co/fRPiHnSwBK
